text: “ ‘Omuntu oyo omwavu bw’anaabanga tasobola kuleeta bukaamukuukulu bubiri oba enjiibwa ento bbiri, anaaleetanga ekiweebwayo olw’ekibi kye, kimu kya kkumi ekya efa5:11 efa yenkanankana liita nga bbiri eky’obuwunga obulungi okuba ekiweebwayo kye olw’okwonoona. Taabuteekengamu mafuta wadde obubaane, kubanga kiweebwayo olw’ekibi.
